page.title: 11KINGSMEAD COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: "When I go home I get changed,go up to the farm and drive a tractor.During the summer I drive to and from the place we keep the corn.We have five bins and a corn grinder.We have a Massey Ferguson Combine which is small but does us.Also a Commer lorry and an International 424 and a MF2840" A survey of 388 pupils excluding the 5th form,gave an idea of the way time is spent outside school. 36% were paid to do the following, 11% housework,11%shopwork(or cafes),9% baby sitting,5% farmwork,4% paper round.Older choldren were more likely to be in paid employment. Watching TV was a favorite pastime.The most poplular programme was the comedy series "the Young Ones" 26%.Parents disapproved of the bad language, violence and anarchy,but the children liked the characters,comic situations,
